snippet.title: 1 Year Into Making My Game | Red Sea Overview
snippet.description:
-----
Website: https://eternalsandsmedia.com/games/red-sea/
Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2192330/Red_Sea/

Red Sea is a Sci-fi Tactical RPG with real-time combat.  As Mission Control for a group of vigilantes, you'll choose their loadouts and script their tactics in a variety of challenging encounters.

This is just a brief overview of the current state of the game 1 year into development.  There's actually a lot of work not shown in the video, but I am going to be releasing multiple videos to cover everything.  Red Sea will be releasing for PC on Steam Early Access in 2023.

0:00 - Intro
0:35 - Mission Select
1:05 - Planning Phase
2:35 - Combat
3:35 - Dynamic Abilities
4:39 - Boss Fight
5:53 - Outro
